1.title: Home Sweet Old Folks Home
1.plot: The girls venture out to a retirement home to visit Kelly's favorite aunt who is celebrating her 100th birthday. At the home, they encounter a host of characters including a sweet elderly woman who shares her decade's long love story with Jenna, a retired stage performer who challenges Tara to respect her craft, and Rick, who Kelly seems to think has changed for the better.

2.title: No Support Hose
2.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

3.title: We Build Monsters
3.plot: Deeply in the Christmas spirit, Jenna decides to bring a homeless man back to the condo for a hot meal and some clean clothes. Her good deed turns scary when a storm forces him to spend the night and our girls let their imaginations get the best of them.

4.title: Sex, Kings and Wigs
4.plot: Kelly is sick of dealing with her hair. If she works out, it's an ordeal to fix it afterwards in time for work related meetings. If she doesn't workout, she doesn't feel at her best. After sitting up late watching infomercials, she happens upon one featuring wigs. Kelly decides she's going to rock her wigs and make her life easier. Tara is excited about a play she's auditioning for. The role she's going after is Coretta Scott King. After a moment, Kelly and Jenna find out that Tara has no idea what Coretta Scott King was all about, and she's playing her like a runaway...

5.title: Mama-Pause
5.plot: Donovan enters the girls' condo to tell them about a crazy lady acting up in the lobby of their condo. After he shows them some footage from his cell phone that he took of the lady going off on the doorman, they realize that the crazy lady is Jenna's mother, Monica. Jenna was not expecting a visit from her mother, and is hoping it will be short and not include any unnecessary drama, but Monica has other plans. She drops a bombshell on Jenna when she tells her that she's dying. Jenna is understandably upset and caught off-guard. When she probes for more information, ...

6.title: Jenna's Double D's
6.plot: Jenna finds herself torn between Donovan and her new boyfriend, so in an effort to make everyone happy, she tries to get them to forge a friendship. Kelly, in a moment of weakness, hangs out with Beverly for a night, then finds it difficult to shake her. Tara meets Enrique's daughter and learns what kind of stepmom she'd be.

7.title: Call a Spade a Spade
7.plot: Donovan needs a partner for his annual spades tournament and enlists Jenna to be his partner. He soon finds out that she's horrible, and Tara swoops in and saves the day. Meanwhile, Kelly placates her sister and agrees to go on a blind date, and is surprised when her date is another ethnicity and she actually likes him.

8.title: Relationship DNR
8.plot: After accompanying Enrique to a meeting with his estate planner, Tara is hit with the not-so-glamorous side of marriage and decides she needs to break off her engagement. Jenna is on a mission to purge some things out of her life, and Kelly wonders if she should join her, starting with getting rid of her annoying assistant, Morgan.

1.title: Pilot
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

2.title: No New Friends
2.plot: Jenna needs some support along her journey of newly rediscovered virginity. She decides to join a Modern Day Virgin group and enjoys the company of like-minded people until one of them strays from chastity and invades her world.

3.title: Go Hard or Go Home
3.plot: Kelly lands a big client for her firm, but loses him just as quickly by letting her competitive nature take over. After feeling the heat from her boss, she has to find a way to get the client back on board.

4.title: Back on Top
4.plot: After Jenna finds herself alone in Donovan's apartment, she can't help but snoop. But what she finds could change the course of their relationship forever. Tara finds herself on an emotional rollercoaster of fame and infamy after an indie movie she did long ago resurfaces, and Kelly secretly continues her dysfunctional relationship with Rick.

5.title: Slaying Your Dragons
5.plot: Jenna finds out that one of her old co-workers started a blog using her same idea, and to add insult to injury, the girl, Chelsea, is selling a lot of ad space and making a lot of money. When Jenna runs into Chelsea at the club, she's too high on Valium to let her have it, and they end up making out and having an all-out love fest. Later, she has to decide if she's going to out Chelsea, or just do her thing the way she was already. Kelly runs into her ex and finds out that he's engaged to be married. She always thought he was "the one" and is thrown for a loop when ...

6.title: Extra
6.plot: Conflicts arise when Jenna and Donovan decide to be each other's wingman for a double date. Meanwhile, Kelly tries to discourage Tara from posing for a risqué magazine.

7.title: Secret Garden
7.plot: Kelly finds out her mother is seeing a much younger man. She doesn't like the idea of that, and when she tries to get her mother to end the relationship, she finds that it's more important to mend theirs. Tara starts dating a guy who she thinks may be "the one" until she finds out she's not the only one in the house that he's slept with. Jenna seeks the advice of a sex expert for her blog.

8.title: The Fight
8.plot: Kelly is excited to throw the fight party of the century, but Jenna's writer's block, Tara's waxing dilemma, and a major mishap put her meticulously planned party in jeopardy.

9.title: Off to See the Wizard
9.plot: Jenna needs to make a little more money, so Kelly hooks her up to be a ghostwriter for one of her firm's clients - Quinn Reed - a fashion mogul who Jenna idolizes. Jenna is super excited about meeting Quinn, then working for her. It's her dream job and she is basking in the glow of happiness. That is until Quinn hits on her. Jenna had no idea that Quinn was even a lesbian, so she's really taken aback by Quinn's interest. Jenna doesn't want to mess up her new job situation, so she doesn't know how to respond. Quinn doesn't pressure Jenna, she just calmly lays out ...

21.title: Where's My Shoe?
21.plot: The girls end up in jail with Jenna missing one of the designer shoes on loan from her boss. They each recount their versions of what happened, trying to piece together the events of the previous night in order to find the missing shoe and determine if they did anything too crazy or irreparable.

imdb.plot outline: Jenna (Danielle Nicolet), a 34 year-old up-and-coming blogger, decides to become celibate when she finds her body count is starting to trump her age. Using her blog as encouragement for her newly adapted sex diet and also as a sounding board for her girlfriends' often amusing "sexcapades," Jenna is determined to make the blog a success and transform her friends in the process.
imdb.title: Born Again Virgin
